milestones.title: Founded DaakBox
milestones.description: Started as a small courier service with a vision to revolutionize logistics in India.

milestones.title: Digital Transformation
milestones.description: Launched our digital platform and mobile app for seamless tracking and booking.

milestones.title: Pan-India Expansion
milestones.description: Expanded operations to 15+ cities across India with 50+ delivery centers.

milestones.title: Technology Innovation
milestones.description: Introduced AI-powered route optimization and WhatsApp integration for customer convenience.

milestones.title: Sustainable Logistics
milestones.description: Launched eco-friendly delivery options and electric vehicle fleet for sustainable operations.

milestones.title: Global Reach
milestones.description: Expanded internationally with partnerships across 10+ countries for seamless global delivery.
